products.title: Laurent Silver Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: If youre looking for the perfect solution for a modern living space then look no further, this slick, silver vertical blind will cover your windows and doors in style. The clean-cut, sleek appearance comes partly from the crisp shade, a lightly textured, mid-tone grey thats a if youre looking for the perfect solution for a modern living space then look no further, this slick, silver vertical blind will cover your windows and doors in style.

products.title: Ava China White Vertical Blind
products.description: Just when you thought vertical blinds couldn't get any more chic, we've added a contemporary raised stripe for a touch of texture on this ava china white vertical blind. Smart and sophisticated this blind is the perfect option for shading large windows, patio doors, kitchens and just when you thought vertical blinds couldn't get any more chic, we've added a contemporary raised stripe for a touch of texture on this ava china white vertical blind.

products.title: Ava City Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The chic grey tone of this ava city grey vertical blind gives you a great base to add some colour with the rest of your design scheme. Smart and sophisticated this classic vertical blind has a contemporary twist thanks to the raised stripe effect in the fabric, adding a touch of the chic grey tone of this ava city grey vertical blind gives you a great base to add some colour with the rest of your design scheme.

products.title: Ezra Parchment Vertical Blind
products.description: Chic and sophisticated this classic vertical blind hangs effortlessly at any window, looking utterly stylish with it's clean vertical lines, not forgetting it'swaterproof and wipe clean too. Ideal for large windows, patio doors, kitchens and bathrooms too, vertical blinds g chic and sophisticated this classic vertical blind hangs effortlessly at any window, looking utterly stylish with it's clean vertical lines, not forgetting it'swaterproof and wipe clean too.

products.title: Decor, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: For graceful style with captivating decoration, choose the dcor in cameo where textured fibres fuse to produce an elegant creamy blind with distinctive, crescent detailing and compelling texture. This exquisite cloth sits on separate, tilting slats that allow you to control the amount of ventilation and light infiltrating the room. For a classy dining area with striking features, combine the cameo with shimmering table runners and silky serviettes.

products.title: Decor, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Cypress Pearl Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind. With a glowing design etched onto a neutral backdrop, this blind is luxuriously balanced. Glam up your life and give your home the star-spangled treatment it deserves. Team up with silk and add a glamorous sparkle to your home with the exquisite cypress pearl vertical blind.

products.title: Cypress Silver Dew Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a little sparkle to your home with this wonderfully glittery cypress silver dew vertical blind. Picked out in platinum grey it has shimmering silver markings that look just like the bark of a tree. When opened, the sunlight will dance and glimmer off the design and when cl add a little sparkle to your home with this wonderfully glittery cypress silver dew vertical blind.
